item.title: How to catch one type of SRL Bot
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:30, topic:420773”][quote author=t4 link=topic=523444.msg3808459#msg3808459 date=1320698423]

No, a lot of them are just people desperate for a new bot now that RSBuddy went down.

i meant the people who operate it.
[/quote]

[quote author=Aff link=topic=523444.msg3808507#msg3808507 date=1320700011]

No, a lot of them are just people desperate for a new bot now that RSBuddy went down.

you can’t judge a community based on the new cunts who flood in without making a contribution in any way
[/quote]I’m judging the new people that are using the bot, not the community.[/quote]
?

Read full topic

item.title: How to catch one type of SRL Bot
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:24, topic:420773”][quote author=Newty link=topic=523444.msg3808266#msg3808266 date=1320673887]
Why would you want to catch an SRL Bot? They are the good guys of runescape cheating and ‘ally’s’ of moparisthebest. Whats not to love about them, they are free to use, open source, and their community is friendly.

I personally think this video should be removed from youtube, but meh, thats just me.
[/quote]
I made the video so, no, its not getting removed. I use to think of bot’s as ally’s in RuneScape and MoparScape. They kept prices low and made it easier to train skills but now I just want to enjoy the game I use to be able too, actually be able to cut a tree without 60 other people spamming it.[/quote]
you’re missing the point, people at SRL are moparisthebest’s cousins (kaitnieks era).

Read full topic
item.source: How to catch one type of SRL Bot

I personally think this video should be removed from youtube, but meh, thats just me.[/quote]
I made the video so, no, its not getting removed. I use to think of bot’s as ally’s in RuneScape and MoparScape. They kept prices low and made it easier to train skills but now I just want to enjoy the game I use to be able too, actually be able to cut a tree without 60 other people spamming it.

item.title: How to catch one type of SRL Bot
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:17, topic:420773”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=523444.msg3807520#msg3807520 date=1320602596]

Hes probably using RiDiverse, the bot which you can make it do anything :o

RiDverse is stationary; you can’t woodcut/fish/anything that requires movement with it.

O, well Idk, might be some other color bot maybe SRL
[/quote]
a poorly dev’d SRL script[/quote]
yep can’t think of anything else :o

Read full topic

item.source: How to catch one type of SRL Bot

item.title: How to catch one type of SRL Bot
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:9, topic:420773”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=523444.msg3807395#msg3807395 date=1320593551]
You could lure it into the wilderness
There’s also a way to stop bots on RSBot/RSBuddy, and I know for a fact it worked before the bots stopped working.
Use a teleother camelot/lumbridge or any teleother magic option on them, and they won’t know how to close the interface and just sit there.
[/quote]
I remember doing that one when rsbuddy was up, the smart botters turn off their accept assistance though. :P[/quote]

Yeah, whenever I botted on my shit accounts, I’d turn accept aid off.
What screen recorder do you use?

Read full topic
item.source: How to catch one type of SRL Bot

There’s also a way to stop bots on RSBot/RSBuddy, and I know for a fact it worked before the bots stopped working.
Use a teleother camelot/lumbridge or any teleother magic option on them, and they won’t know how to close the interface and just sit there.[/quote]
I remember doing that one when rsbuddy was up, the smart botters turn off their accept assistance though.
